name: Zep Hotcakes
description: Don't Blow The Illusion x AMARA Swimwear Everything-wear. Whether you are packing for vaca, headed to yoga, catching the surf -or not going anywhere, this versatile number was made to be your first pick every time. Hotcakes fit snug for swim and surf. Photography by Robin Waters *Made with human hands in NYC's Garment District *82% Polyester/18% Lycra *Italian made eco-friendly fabric *Printed in USA *Raw edge finish for extreme comfort *Due to the handmade nature of this product, please allow up to 3 weeks for shipment*

categories.name: Don't Blow The Illusion x AMARA

name: The Party
description:
This sheer black mesh cover up brings out the dreamy romantic in any poolside party-goer. Worn over any swimsuit, The Party can take swimwear from day to night and covers up some skin on a hot day. Sheer material and a drawstring in the front, edged with beads and tassels, serves to add drama to every silhouette.

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Bead and Tassel Finishing on Strings

name: Restless Dawn
description:
This is the more demure sister of Let’s Call It Off. A full swimsuit, in the burnt orange version of her brash twin, Restless Dawn is about to take on a new day. With similar detailing on the suit’s front, the multiple criss-cross strapped back symbolizes the countless directions each new day can take.

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex

name: CrayCray
description:
Slash-style peepholes on the sides of this gorgeous one-piece have a retro vibe and a modern attitude. In dreamy aqua blue, this swimsuit is perfect for an unpredictable girl who’s not afraid to make a scene and worships the drama. CrayCray is a suit that’s sexy and wild.

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Built in Bra Support

name: In For The Kill
description:
The devil’s in the details of this one-piece peek-a-boo suit that’s made for a woman who knows what she wants and wants everyone else to know it too. In For The Kill features a perfect balance of wine coloured fabric and mesh-style accents, accented by a low-scooped back and chain link detailing on the shoulders. 

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Pair with your favorite jeans to make a Killer club outfit!

name: Fly With Me Top
description:
This is the bikini for the diehard romantic. It has a twisted top and low cut bottom with chain link sides, the cape is detachable and the top can be tied four different ways—depending on your mood. 

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Detachable Cape
*Bead and Tassel Finishing on Strings
*Convertible Top Lets You Wear It Many Different Ways!

name: Fly With Me Bottom
description:
This is the bikini for the diehard romantic. It has a twisted top and low cut bottom with chain link sides, the cape is detachable and the top can be tied four different ways—depending on your mood. 

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Chain link side detail
*Semi Brazilian Cut Bottom

name: Cover My Eyes Top
description:
This is the swimsuit for the girl who wants his eyes everywhere. In delicious burnt orange, Cover My Eyes, has peep holes in all the right places, sure to get looks from the even the least ‘eyesy’ audience. Remember to SPF under this suit, to avoid getting patterned when you take it off!

LIMITED EDITION! ONLY A FEW LEFT IN STOCK!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Featured on The Glamourai and Trop Rouge blogs!

name: Cover My Eyes Bottom
description:
This is the swimsuit for the girl who wants his eyes everywhere. In delicious burnt orange, Cover My Eyes, has peep holes in all the right places, sure to get looks from the even the least ‘eyesy’ audience. Remember to SPF under this suit, to avoid getting patterned when you take it off!

LIMITED EDITION! ONLY A FEW LEFT IN STOCK!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Featured on The Glamourai and Trop Rouge blogs!

name: The Sequel Top
description:
The next installment of Cover My Eyes, this gorgeous matte navy bikini boasts a lower cut brief showing gorgeous flashes of flesh with every move. The SPF tip also applies with this bikini, which isn’t meant for deep sea splashing, but stretching out splendidly on a beachside lounger and being seen!

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Bead and Tassel Finishing on Strings (Not Shown in Picture)

name: The Sequel Bottom
description:
The next installment of Cover My Eyes, this gorgeous matte navy bikini boasts a lower cut brief showing gorgeous flashes of flesh with every move. The SPF tip also applies with this bikini, which isn’t meant for deep sea splashing, but stretching out splendidly on a beachside lounger and being seen!

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Low-rise brief cut 
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex

name: Let's Call It Off Top
description:
If there was a bikini for the woman who’s shaking up her life, this is it. It’s about ending something on your terms and prepping for a big change. Let’s Call It Off is the swimsuit of transformation; the double bands above the line of the bikini top mirror the connective bands on the shallow brief-style bottoms—a parallel lifeline that represents infinite paths.

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Great for pairing with a sheer top and hitting the town!

name: Let's Call It Off Bottom
description:
If there was a bikini for the woman who’s shaking up her life, this is it. It’s about ending something on your terms and prepping for a big change. Let’s Call It Off is the swimsuit of transformation; the double bands above the line of the bikini top mirror the connective bands on the shallow brief-style bottoms—a parallel lifeline that represents infinite paths.

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Semi-Brazilian cut bottom

name: Show Out
description:
This stunning navy monokini-style bikini, is a Miss Jackson signature cut, with mesh sides to show off some hip and straps that can be tied four different ways to create a signature look that let’s you really Show Out.

LIMITED EDITION!

*Made in NYC's Garment District
*Fully Lined
*80% Nylon / 20% Spandex
*Bead and Tassel Finishing on Strings
*Convertible Top Lets You Wear It 4 Different Ways! 
*Featured on www.TheGlamourai.com
